text: What if we had a tool that was the same for everyone in this room?   And the same for kids in the classroom next door?   And the same for kids all over the world?   To solve this problem, people all over the world agreed to use standard units.

sentences.text: What if we had a tool that was the same for everyone in this room?
And the same for kids in the classroom next door?
And the same for kids all over the world?
To solve this problem, people all over the world agreed to use standard units.
